abstract: You can save electricity by setting your computer’s monitor to turn off automatically after a few minutes of inactivity.
snippet: You can save electricity by setting your computer’s monitor to turn off automatically after a few minutes of inactivity.
lead_paragraph: If you’re not eating lunch at your desk or working all night, you can save electricity  and maybe even a little bit of the earth  by setting your computer’s monitor to turn off automatically after a few minutes of inactivity. This advice may seem rather basic, but about half of Americans don’t do this, according to a Harris poll last year.

headline.main: Tip of the Week: Saving a Little Bit of the Earth

abstract: NBC is experimenting with offering its TV shows free to iPhone users using streaming technology. This will allow NBC to make money from advertising and avoid selling downloads through Apple’s iTunes Store.
snippet: NBC is experimenting with offering its TV shows free to iPhone users using streaming technology. This will allow NBC to make money from advertising and avoid selling downloads through Apple’s iTunes Store.

headline.main: NBC Bypasses Apple to Stream TV Shows to the iPhone
